messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

new for client wednesday december pm client hello please instance client setup form instance thanks

message.reasoning:

I'm now zeroing in on the "Access" and "Storage" categories, but leaning towards "Access" because of the phrase "instance setup form".
